categoryNotes.Shapes: Largest category with 43 items including towers (torres), pyramids (piramides), eggs (huevos), hearts (corazones), and freeforms. All polished/carved pieces should be categorized here.
categoryNotes.With base: 20 items from bases de metal collection - any piece with visible metal or wood mounting base.
categoryNotes.Geodes: 15 items total - 9 Grand Collection cathedral geodes plus 6 Uruguay collection pieces with cathedral/cave-like formations.
categoryNotes.Amethyst: 16 raw/natural amethyst clusters from bultos and preformados collections - unpolished natural formations.
categoryNotes.Cavity: 6 small polished cavity pieces with hollow formations showing interior crystals.
categoryNotes.Agates: 7 items from chapas collection - banded agate slabs and decorative pieces including the unique moon lamp.
categoryNotes.Jewelry Box: 6 small decorative pieces from home deco and freeforms minis - perfect for small displays or jewelry storage.

namingPatterns.towers: Polished [Color] [Stone] Tower/Point - e.g., 'Polished Amethyst Tower Point'
namingPatterns.geodes: Grand Collection names are exceptional and were kept. Uruguay geodes use descriptive adjectives like 'Elegant', 'Deep Purple', etc.
namingPatterns.cavities: [Color/Type] [Stone] Cavity/Formation - small hollow pieces with crystal interiors
namingPatterns.shapes: [Shape] [Stone] Formation - for hearts, pyramids, eggs, etc.

stoneTypeFindings.amethyst: Dominant stone type throughout collection - ranges from deep purple to lavender
stoneTypeFindings.mixedMinerals: Many pieces contain multiple minerals including citrine, clear quartz, pink minerals, and green minerals
stoneTypeFindings.agate: Found primarily in chapas collection with distinctive banding patterns
stoneTypeFindings.citrine: Golden/yellow crystals present in some bases de metal pieces
stoneTypeFindings.clearQuartz: Mixed with amethyst in many torres (towers)

sizeDistribution.medium: 12 items - larger cortados and some chapas

edgeCases: uruguay-079: Unique moon-shaped agate lamp - decorative functional piece
uruguay-006: Mixed mini collection - multiple small pieces in one listing
uruguay-057: Heart collection showing various mineral types
grand-009: Exceptional piece with 28 photo angles - crown jewel of collection

recommendations.categoryImplementation: Consider updating the products.json file with these suggested categories for better organization and customer filtering.
recommendations.namingConsistency: Grand Collection names are already excellent and descriptive. Uruguay collection would benefit from the suggested professional naming to match the Grand Collection quality.
recommendations.additionalCategories: Consider adding sub-categories like 'Premium Towers', 'Mini Pieces', 'Decorative Items' for more granular filtering.
recommendations.websiteFilters: Implement category filters and size filters based on this analysis for better customer experience.
recommendations.photographyNote: All pieces have professional white background photography. Grand Collection #09 has exceptional 28-angle documentation.
